name: Burger Buddies
description:
switch between each of the burger buddies to solve puzzles and get them to the burger buns!

this itch page is under construction! sorry for the inconvenience :0

HOW TO PLAY

WASD: move
Q/E [or] RMB: switch between characters

Special Abilities:

Cheese: wall jump
Lettuce: double jump
Tomato: shoot seeds [J]

CREDITS by the Shark Truce! Grant Ross: Programming
Chris Kim: Level Design, Game Design
Eriane Austria: Background/Environment Art
Max: Music, SFX
Karina Teruya: Character Art/Animation, Menu Art
